events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size was incorrect and it doesn't fit me at all.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer's complaint about product size and the desire to return the item.
Customer service agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I'll be happy to assist you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for the refund?
Sure, my order number is 548392, and yes, the jacket is unused and still in the original packaging. I hope this helps with the refund.
Thank you for the info. We can process your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I'll email you the prepaid shipping label for the return.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful instructions. I'll send the jacket back this week using the label you send.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not received any further questions, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for your cooperation and patience.
